scripts.build: npm run -w packages build && npm run -w auth compile && npm run -w workspace compile
scripts.lint: npm run -w auth lint && npm run -w workspace lint
scripts.test: npm run -w auth test && npm run -w workspace test
scripts.dev: nodemon -e ts,js,yml,yaml,json -w auth -w workspace -w packages/src -w template.yaml -i auth/bundle -i workspace/bundle -i .aws-sam -i node_modules -i 'auth/vendor' -i 'workspace/vendor' --delay 700ms -x "make start"
